promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, short, single-word name for a chibi cute rare lion fire-type pokemon wearing ruby bracers. It can be found in volcano-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, fire or lion. Ony answer with the generated name
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Igniruby, a a chibi cute rare lion fire-type pokemon. It can be found in volcano-like environments It has the following abilities: Grand Flame, Max Poltergeist. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the words "lion", "fire" or "Igniruby". Use a maximum of 150 characters. Only answer with the generated description.
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of fire-type pokemon, lion-like, rare, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, lava texture background
generatedDescription: This mini king of the infernal wilderness roars with scorching power; its Grand Flame and Max Poltergeist abilities charm all who brave volcanic realms.
